On 25/01/2011 20:35, jeff47 wrote:
> I got that. How do I make these changes persistent?
>

'My Computer', right mouse, Properties, 'Advanced' tab, "Environment
Variables" button, Edit User of System variable, Ok, Ok, Ok ...

.. persisted.

Caveat - there are probably slight variations depending on which windows
you run (this in for XP), but I hope you reach the right location and
result.

-- 
Mark
